opponent.label: Binah
opponent.description: Binah is the Patron Librarian of the Floor of Philosophy in the Library, formerly the Sephirah of Lobotomy Corporation's Extraction Team and a former Arbiter. Binah is a wise, dignified, and mysterious person. Although she possesses an immense amount of knowledge about The City and its denizens as a former Arbiter. Despite her hard work, she cannot fully shake her old sadistic habits.
